 2024-01462024-02-19NRCAN
ActCanada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Administrative Monetary Penalties Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA-NOVA SCOTIA OFFSHORE PETROLEUM ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to replace Parts 2 through 5 of Schedule 1 with a new part that references the relevant provisions from the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0028 Publication Date: 2024-02-28
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA-NOVA SCOTIA OFFSHORE PETROLEUM ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES REGULATIONS in order to replace Parts 2 through 5 of Schedule 1 with a new part that references the relevant provisions from the Regulations.
